title: Provincial Service Tribunals (Extension of Provisions of the Constitution) Act, 1974
title_en: Provincial Service Tribunals (Extension of Provisions of the Constitution) Act, 1974
description: Official consolidated text of Provincial Service Tribunals (Extension of Provisions of the Constitution) Act, 1974 (XXXII of 1974) published by The Pakistan Code (Service Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and commencement
provisions.content:
(1) This Act may be called the Provincial Service
Tribunals (Extension of Provisions of the Constitution) Act, 1974.
(2) It shall come into force at once.

provisions.title: Section 2. Provisions of Article 212 (2) to extend to Provincial Service Tribunals. The provisions
provisions.content:
of clause (2) of Article 212 of the Constitution of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan shall extend to
the Service Tribunals respectively established under Acts of the 3[Provincial Assemblies for
Balochistan,] the North-West Frontier Province, the Punjab and Sind.
